subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object that defines configuration properties for the Splitter UI component.

subMembers.name: allowKeyboardNavigation
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to allow the Splitter to take focus and allow keyboard navigation.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<dxSplitterItem> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: items
subMembers.description: An array of items (panes) displayed by the UI component.

subMembers.name: separatorSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the size of a separator bar in pixels.

subMembers.name: Interfaces
subMembers.description: This section describes interfaces that the {WidgetName} component uses.

subMembers.name: collapsed
subMembers.description: Specifies whether an item (pane) is initially collapsed.

subMembers.name: collapsedSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the size of a collapsible item (pane) when collapsed in pixels or as a percentage.

subMembers.name: collapsible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether an item (pane) is collapsible.

subMembers.name: maxSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the maximum size of an item (pane) in pixels or as a percentage.

subMembers.name: minSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum size of an item (pane) in pixels or as a percentage.

subMembers.name: resizable
subMembers.description: Specifies whether an item (pane) is resizable.

subMembers.name: size
subMembers.description: Specifies the initial size of an item (pane) in pixels or as a percentage. The size changes after any layout alteration.

properties.name: dxSplitter
properties.description: Splitter is a UI component that allows you to divide a page or section into multiple adjustable [panes].

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when an item (pane) is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemCollapsed
Events.description: A function that is executed after an item (pane) is collapsed.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when an item (pane) is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: onItemExpanded
Events.description: A function that is executed after an item (pane) is expanded.

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after an item (pane) is rendered.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onResize
Events.description: A function that is executed each time an item (pane) is resized by one pixel.

Events.name: onResizeEnd
Events.description: A function that is called when resizing ends.

Events.name: onResizeStart
Events.description: A function that is called when resizing starts.

Events.name: itemCollapsed
Events.description: Raised after an item (pane) is collapsed.

Events.name: itemExpanded
Events.description: Raised after an item (pane) is expanded.

Events.name: resize
Events.description: Raised each time an item (pane) is resized by one pixel.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemCollapsedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemCollapsed] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemContextMenuEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemContextMenu] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemExpandedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemExpanded] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemRendered] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ResizeEndEvent
Types.description: The type of the [resizeEnd] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ResizeEvent
Types.description: The type of the [resize] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ResizeStartEvent
Types.description: The type of the [resizeStart] event handler's argument.
